00015 // the constructor
00016 BuildModel::BuildModel(QDomNode &node): command_(),
00017 commandAttributes_(), flags_(), flagAttributes_(),
00018 replaceDefaultFlags_(false), defaultFlagAttributes_() {
00019 
00020         for (int i = 0; i < node.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00021                 QDomNode tempNode = node.childNodes().at(i);
00022 
00023                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:command")) {
00024                         command_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00025                         General::parseAttributes(tempNode, commandAttributes_);
00026                 }
00027 
00028                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:flags")) {
00029                         flags_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00030                         General::parseAttributes(tempNode, flagAttributes_);
00031                 }
00032 
00033                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:replaceDefaultFlags")) {
00034                         QString temp = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00035                         replaceDefaultFlags_ = General::str2Bool(temp, false);
00036                         General::parseAttributes(tempNode, defaultFlagAttributes_);
00037                 }
00038         }
00039 }

00056 BuildModel & BuildModel::operator=( const BuildModel &other ) {

00058                 command_ = other.command_;
00059                 commandAttributes_ = other.commandAttributes_;
00060                 flags_ = other.flags_;
00061                 flagAttributes_ = other.flagAttributes_;

00072 void BuildModel::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00073         if (!command_.isEmpty()) {
00074                 // start the spirit:command tag
00075                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:command");
00076 
00077                 // write the attributes for the element
00078                 General::writeAttributes(writer, commandAttributes_);
00079 
00080                 // write the value of the element and close the tag
00081                 writer.writeCharacters(command_);
00082                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:command
00083         }
00084 
00085         if (!flags_.isEmpty()) {
00086                 // start the spirit:flags tag
00087                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:flags");
00088 
00089                 // write the attributes for the element
00090                 General::writeAttributes(writer, flagAttributes_);
00091 
00092                 // write the value of the element and close the tag
00093                 writer.writeCharacters(flags_);
00094                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:flags
00095         }
00096 
00097         // start the spirit:replaceDefaultFlags tag
00098         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:replaceDefaultFlags");
00099 
00100         // write the attributes for the element
00101         General::writeAttributes(writer, defaultFlagAttributes_);
00102 
00103         // write the value of the element and close the tag
00104         writer.writeCharacters(General::bool2Str(replaceDefaultFlags_));
00105         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:replaceDefaultFlags
00106 }

00108 void BuildModel::setCommandAttributes(
00109                 const QMap<QString, QString> &commandAttributes) {
00110         // delete the old command attributes
00111         commandAttributes_.clear();
00112 
00113         // save the new command attributes
00114         commandAttributes_ = commandAttributes;
